BZTurk is an extension that helps in increasing the earnings and efficiency of Amazon Mechanical Turk workers.

This automation streamlines the workflow, ultimately maximizing earnings and efficiency for the workers.

BZTurk continues to be a valuable platform for connecting businesses with a global workforce and for workers seeking remote, flexible work opportunities. As technology and the demand for human insights evolve, BZTurk will likely remain an essential player in the economy and the future of crowdsourcing.

❖ Unleash Your Earning Potential: Exploring MTurk Opportunities
Unlock an unmatched level of flexibility when it comes to exploring, sorting, and filtering tasks through the Search window. This unique functionality seamlessly combines three search types into a unified interface, providing MTurk workers with the tools they need to efficiently navigate and arrange tasks in ways previously unimagined.

❖ Streamlined Task Gathering: Automation at Its Best
Utilize the full potential of bzturk's premium license to seamlessly accept and access the latest tasks, all set at your chosen reward value. Customers also enjoy the capability to collect favored clients and tasks, applying customized rules for a refined and enhanced user experience.

❖ Increase Productivity
Elevate your productivity with cutting-edge methods and unparalleled customization options for task collection and completion on MTurk. Tailor your preferences and select your preferred mode of receiving alerts when tasks become available.

❖ APIs and Interactions
Enjoy seamless login convenience on MTurk. Gain insightful Turkerview reviews to make well-informed choices. Stay informed at all times with browser, audio, and push notifications to ensure you never overlook important updates.

❖ Gains Overview: Unveiling Your Income Snapshot
Effortlessly visualize your earnings, monitor your submissions, and review your history using bzturk. Stay up-to-date with automatic updates on submission progress, and receive celebratory notifications to acknowledge your goal accomplishments.

❖ Engage with Tasks Seamlessly on the BZTurk App
Enhance productivity using bzturk's top-tier MTurk scripts tailored for extensive batch tasks. Efficiently manage chosen tasks/clients through ongoing task collection and the dedicated Focus window, independent of queue position. Streamline your workflow by effortlessly submitting finished tasks directly within the application.

Key Features:
	★ Auto HIT Finder: Automate the retrieval of HITs on Amazon Mechanical Turk with customizable filter settings for relevant and specific task assignments.
	★ HIT Catcher: Add catchers manually using 'O' for once and 'M' for multiple HITs, effectively managing tasks in your MTurk HITs queue.
	★ Auto HIT Catcher: Monitor and capture high-paying MTurk tasks continuously to maintain a competitive advantage and grab prime earning opportunities.
	★ Search/Filter: Customize preferences, including notifications, requester blocking, favorite keywords, and HIT selection criteria based on rewards.
	★ Favorite Requester: Prioritize tasks from your preferred requesters based on their reliability, interest, and profitability.
	★ Block Requester: Exclude tasks with specific keywords that you prefer to avoid.
	★ Swap License: Easily switch licenses between active worker IDs, subject to available swap counts.
	★ Monitor/Tracker: Keep track of your MTurk workflow progress on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis, including payment status and historical data.
